abstract: More than 80 women have come forward with allegations of sexual misconduct against Harvey Weinstein, but as he goes on trial in New York, the criminal charges center on just two. The story of Lucia Evans helps explain why.
lead_paragraph: Listen and subscribe to our podcast from your mobile device: Via Apple Podcasts | Via Spotify | Via Stitcher
keywords: She Said: Breaking the Sexual Harassment Story That Helped Ignite a Movement (Book)
